column2: Here's another one of the games in the Terminal 2 Network - Dragon's Apprentice.
This reminds me of games from when I was younger... Look up Nethack, sometime, if you like.

Uh-oh! I'm detecting that `Dragon's Apprentice` isn't installed!

You need to download it from the App Center if you want to play.

Click the icon named `More Apps` on the Desktop, then search for the program you want to install.
Learn magic and save the realm in this 3rd-person action RPG.
